name: Shout of Terror
description: Deals damage to enemies aroud the caster and dampens their armor. Enemies hit have a chance of being stunned.

name: Frost Wave
description: Emits Cold energy in front of the caster to deal damage to enemies.

name: Shield Charge
description: Charges forward to inflict Physical DMG on the enemy.

name: Combo
description: Swings weapon to attack the enemy twice. Deals DMG even faster from Frenzy effect on hit.

name: Illusion Axe
description: Summons Illusion Axes that circle around the caster to deal damage to the enemy.

name: Lightning Strike
description: Calls down lightning in front and around the caster to deal damage to enemies.

name: Explosive Slash
description: Applies Debuff effect on hit. Killing a Debuffed enemy causes an explosion that deals damage to nearby enemies.

name: Earth Blow
description: Strikes the ground to deal Physical DMG and increase Critical Rate

name: Leap Attack
description: Leaps forward to inflict damage and knock enemies back upon landing.

name: Whirlwind
description: Spins toward the control direction while Channeling, dealing damage to all enemies in the path.

name: Crescent Slash
description: Swings weapon in a wide area to deal Physical DMG to multiple enemies.

name: Lightning Vortex
description: Swings weapon to damage multiple enemies and create a vortex. The vortex deals additional damage to nearbly enemies.

name: Illusion Hook
description: Throws a hook to inflict Physical DNG on the enemy. Enemies hit will pulled toward the caster.

name: Shield Strike
description: Knock the enemies back with a shield to inflict Physical damage.

name: Quick Slash
description: Inflicts additional damage to nearby enemies upon hitting a singl enemy.

name: Fissure
description: Slams the ground to create a fissure that deals damage to enemies in a wide area. Deals less damage to enemies that are far away from the fissure.

name: Bloodshed
description: Chance to afflict Bleed to targets hit and creates a Domain of Blood upon afflicting Bleed.

name: Frost Strike
description: Strikes the ground to create a Frost Pillar that deals damage to enemies.

name: Fighter's Wrath
description: Amplifies Melee DMG and increases Attack Speed during skill duration.

name: Bulwark of Protection
description: Increases Armor and Elemental Resist during skill duration.

name: Shout of Provocation
description: Increases the caster's Armor during skill duration amd fotces enemies within range to attack the caster. Temporarily increases DMG upon use.

name: Blood Explosion
description: Chance to cause Blood Explosion in the surrounding area

name: Guardian
description: Deals Physical DMG to nearbly enemies and inflicts Stun or Slow on hit.

name: Enduring pain
description: Increases Armor based on stack upon taking damage while using this skill. Gains an Enchance buff at Max Stack.

name: Electric Area
description: Creates an Electric Area that deals Lightning damage in the forward direction. Enemies within range take Lightning damage periodically.

name: Wheel Slash
description: Slash the surroundings to deal Dot to the target.

name: Sprint
description: Instantly sprints very quickly. When used, temporarily immune to control status abnormalities.

name: Whirlwind Slash
description: Slashes the air quickly to send forth a Whirlwind.

name: Tenacious Regeneration
description: Increases HP and HP Regen during skill duration.

name: Seal of Condensed Destruction
description: Increases Physical DMG.

name: Seal of Defense
description: Increases Armor.

name: Seal of Crowd Control Dodge
description: Increases your Crowd Control Dodge Chance.

name: Fire Blow
description: Slams the ground to deal Fire DMG and create a Fire Pillar.

name: Shout of Justice
description: Dampens enemy damage within range during its duration, temporarily recovars HP, and removes Status Effects during Skill duration.

name: Fierce Strike
description: Summons a hammer to deal Physical damage to multiple enemies. Periodically summons a giant hammer to deal even more damage instead.

name: Fire Storm
description: Spin in place to create a Fire Storm. Chance to cause a new Fire Storm upon killing a Burning enemy.

name: Seal of Physical Domain
description: Decreases Target's Physical DMG Taken.

name: Seal of Striking
description: Amplifies Target's Strike DMG.

name: Imperfect Skill Rune (Red)
description: An imperfect Skill Rune. Unusable, but can be spend as an ingredient for synthesis.

name: Spread Shot
description: Fires several arrows over a wide area to inflict physical damage on the enemy.

name: Explosive Arrow
description: Fires an exploding arrow to deal damage to the enemy. Killing an enemy with an attached arrow inflicts additional explosion damage.

name: Icy Arrow
description: Fires an icy arrow to damage the enemy. Frost Spheres are formed along the arrow's path inflicting additional damage with an explosion.

name: Rapid Shot
description: Fires multiple arrows in a straight line to inflict physical damage on the enemy.

name: Poison Cloud
description: Forms a poisonous cloud around the caster to deal Poison DMG to enemies.

name: Piercing Arrow
description: Fires an arrow that pierces all enemies to inflict damage.

name: Rain of Arrows
description: Temporarily calls down a Rain of Arrows to damage enemies.

name: Burn Arrow
description: Shoots a Fire arrow that causes Burn and inflicts damage on the enemy.

name: Cross Lightning Arrow
description: Fires an arrow that explodes in a cross shape to inflict damage on the enemy.

name: Dagger Throw
description: Throws a dagger to damage the enemy. Inflicts additional damage by bouncing off surrounding enemies on hit.

name: Roll
description: Rolls a shout distance forward.

name: Cross Slash
description: Cross your weapons to deal damage twice to enemies in front of you.

name: Illusion Strike
description: Moves forward to inflict damage on enemies. Chance to cause Status Effects on Strikes and Critical Hits.

name: Piercing Sentry
description: Piercing Sentry has the Strike, Physical, Projectile tags.

name: Fan Blade Sentry
description: Fan Blade Sentry has the Strike, Physical, Projectile tags.

name: Electric Sentry
description: Electric Sentry has the Strike, Lightning, Projectile tags.

name: Venom Fang
description: Swings a Dagger to deal Area damage. Range increases every time you deal damage to the enemy.

name: Shadow Forest
description: Creates an artificial space that deals DoT to enemies.

name: Blade of Death
description: Throws a dagger that returns to the caster.

name: Bombardment Arrow
description: Fires an arrow that bombards a large area.

name: Venomous Strength
description: Stabs forward to deal damage. Attack Speed and Poison damage increases with every attack.

name: Unleash Lighting Shot
description: Fires an arrow that causes an electric shock. Erupts lightning bolts on impact on a Shocked target.

name: Frost Sentry
description: Frost Sentry has the Strike, Area of Effect, Cold, Projectile tags.

name: Vital Strike
description: Increases Critical Rate and Critical DMG during skill duration.

name: Marksman
description: Increases Projectile DMG and Pierce Count during skill duration.

name: Illusion Arrow
description: Chance to automatically fire a Guided Arrow upon reaching stack count with Bow Skills.

name: Poison Explosion
description: Chance to cause Poison Explosion in the surrounding area upon reaching stack count by inflicting Poison.

name: Counterattack
description: Chance to deal damage to the enemy upon dodging an stack.

name: Improved Senses
description: Gains a temporary Enhance effect based on the number of Daggers equipped upon using a Skill.

name: Freeze Arrow
description: Fires multiple arrows that freeze the enemy to deal damage and cause an additional Cold Explosion upon afflicting Freeze.

name: Scorching Arrow
description: Fires a burning arrow. Gains Maintan Position effect on hit and fires an additional arrow based on the number of stacks.

name: Lightning Arrow
description: Fires arrows in a row to deal Lightning Damage on the enemy. Obtain Lightning Energy at a certain chance, increase Damage and Attack Speed per Lightning Energy.

name: Shockwave Trap
description: Installs a Trap that explodes to deal Physical damage upon detecting an enemy.

name: Flame Fissure Trap
description: Installs a Trap that explodes to deal Fire damage upon detecting an enemy.

name: Frost Trap
description: Frost spheres explode upon detection, setting up a trap that deals Frost damage to enemies.

name: Electric Sphere Trap
description: Set up a trap that fires a random flying ball of electricity when it detects an enemy, dealing electrical damage.

name: Poison Gas Trap
description: When it detects an enemy, it sets a trap that leaves poison gas and deals poison damage to the enemy.

name: Activate Trap
description: Forces all installed Traps to activate.

name: Shockwave Sentry
description: Shockwave Sentry has the Strike, Physical, Projectile tags.

name: Penetrating Slash
description: Moves forward, inflicting Physical damage on enemies in your path.

name: Poison Rain of Arrows
description: Fires an arrow into the air to inflict damage on the enemy.

name: Attack Impulse
description: Temporarily increases Attack Speed and Physical DMG based on the user's Dexterity upon use.

name: Seal of Accuracy
description: Increases Accuracy.

name: Seal of Dodge
description: Increases own Evasion.

name: Seal of Critical Chance
description: Increases Critical Chance.

name: Sentry Expert
description: Changes Sentry Stats according to the situation.

name: Fireball Trap
description: Set up a trap that fires a randomly exploding sphere of fire upon detection of an enemy, dealing Fire damage.

name: Chill Zone Trap
description: Place a trap that leaves a chill zone when it detects an enemy and deals Frost damage.

name: Shockwave Arrow
description: Fires an arrow that pierces through a short distance to deal damage to enemies.

name: Spinning Dagger
description: Fires a spinning dagger that pierces through enemies in a straight line, dealing damage.

name: Veil of Protection
description: Decreases Melee or Projectile DMG Taken whenever a Skill is used.

name: Seal of Chaos Resist
description: Increase Chaos Resist.

name: Enchanted Crossbow
description: When focusing, increases the attack speed of nearby Crossbows in proportion to the number of stacks.

name: Imperfect Skill Rune (Green)
description: An imperfect Skill Rune. Unusable, but can be spend as an ingredient for synthesis.

name: Summon Abyssling
description: Abyssling has the Strike, Area of Effect, Physical, Melee tags.

name: Gather Minions
description: Summons all Minions to the caster's location.

name: Fire Ball
description: Fires a fire ball that explodes on hit to deal fire damage.

name: Frost Ball
description: Fires a slow-moving Frost Sphere that pierces enemies in its path to deal cold damage.

name: Frost shock
description: Forms an area of Ice Thorns around the caster to deal Cold DMG yo enemies.

name: Poison Orb
description: Throws a poison orb that bounces forward and deals Poison DMG to enemy.

name: Lightning Typhoon
description: Temporarily summons a Lightning Typhooon that follows enemies to deal Lighting DMG.

name: Frost Thorn
description: Fires a series of frost spikes, dealing Frost damage to enemies.

name: Flamethrower
description: Deals fire damage, increasing range and amplifying damage for each Channeling stage. Causes Fire Explosion upon canceling Channeling.

name: Charge Release
description: Fires several electric currents to deal Lightning DMG on the enemy.

name: Toxic Flame
description: Fires a piercing toxic flame that deals Poison DoT. Is not affected by Projectile DMG.

name: Summon Javelin Abyssling
description: Javelin Abyssling has the Strike, Physical, Projectile tags.

name: Unite Crowd (Enrage)
description: Changes your Minion's active stance every time this skill is used.

name: Summon Bursting Rune Knight
description: Bursting Rune Knight has the Strike, Area of Effect, Fire, Melee tags.

name: Sacred Devotion
description: Decreases the caster's Armor and all Element Resist while channelimg, but increases Minion DMG.

name: Cold Armor
description: Forms an ice barrier that inflict Cold DMG and causes Chill to attackers when hit by a melee attack.

name: Lightning chain
description: Discharges lightning that chains to deal lightning damage to multiple enemies.

name: Meteor
description: Drops a huge meteorite in front, dealing damage to enemies within range.

name: Poison Area
description: Temporarily forms a poisonius area to deal Poison DMG to enemies.

name: Plague Spike
description: Fires plague spikes to deal Poison DMG to the enemy. Chance to spread Plague on hit to inflict DoT on nearby enemies.

name: Frost Bomb
description: Fires a Frost Bomb that explodes after a period of time. Upon explosion, shoots several Ice Shards to deal Cold DMG on the enemy.

name: Thunderbolt
description: Chance to call down Lightning and deal damage to the attacker when hit by a melee attack.

name: Summon Fire Orb Abyssling
description: Fire Orb Abyssling has the Strike, Range, Area of Effect, Fire, Projectile tags.

name: Summon Poison Arrow Abyssling
description: Poison Arrow Abyssling has the Strike, Poison, Projectile tags.

name: Summon Lightning Arrow Abyssling
description: Lightning Arrow Abyssling has the Strike, Lightning, Projectile tags.

name: Summon Snow Orb Abyssling
description: Snow Orb Abyssling has the Strike, Cold, Projectile tags.

name: Mark of Focus
description: Marks an enemy for a period of time. The marked enemy becomes the target of minion attacks and receives increased damage from Minions.

name: Siphon Life
description: Grants enemy HP Absorb effect to yourself and allies during skill duration.

name: Summon Arctic Rune Knight
description: Arctic Rune Knight has the Strike, Area of Effect, Cold, Melee tags.

name: Summon Lightning Rune Knight
description: Lightning Rune Knight has the Strike, Area of Effect, Lightning, Melee tags.

name: Release Element
description: Amplifies Element DMG and inreases Cast Speed during skill duration.

name: Intensify Pain
description: Increases DoT Rate? Duration? and DMG during skill duration.

name: Cold Outburst
description: Launches nultiple Ice Spikes forward. Deals damage beyond the target with Ice Shards.

name: Weaken Element Totem
description: Summons a Totem that increases Element DMG Taken by enemies.

name: Tremor Totem
description: Summons a Totem that dampens Movement Speed and Attack Speed of enemies.

name: Protection Totem
description: Summons a Totem that increases Barrier and decreases Barrier Regen Cycle of allies.

name: Life totem
description: Summons a Totem that increases HP Regen for allies.

name: Mist Totem
description: Summons a totem that reduces the enemy's hit rate and criticality.

name: Electromagnetic Field
description: Releases an Electric Sphere that instantly draws enemies to the center.

name: Teleport
description: Teleports forward. Temporarily increases Element Resist after teleporting.

name: Agile Movement
description: If you take damage while maintaining the skill, you receive a buff that reduces damage in proportion to your Zodiac Evasion for a certain period of time.

name: Pantheon
description: Enhances your Barrier to greatly increase Barrier Regen.

name: Fire torrent
description: Channels to temporarily summon a Fire Torrent. Flames periodically spew out from the torrent to track down enemies. Attacks grow faster with longer channeling.

name: Electric Ball
description: Fires an electric ball that periodically explodes. Explosions deal Lightning DMG to nearby enemies.

name: Sacred Light
description: Deals DMG with the highest Element while Channeling. DMG penetrates Element Resist at maximum Enhance Effect stacks.

name: Summon Wrathful Rune Knight
description: Wrathful Rune Knight has the Strike, Area of Effect, Physical, Melee tags.

name: Spell Protection Totem
description: Summons a totem that blocks enemy spells, reducing damage.

name: Seal of Condensed Elements
description: Increases Element DMG.

name: Seal of Element Resist
description: Increases Element Resist for all Elements.

name: Summon Twisted Abyssling
description: Twisted Abyssling has the Strike, Area of Effect, Physical, Melee tags.

name: Judgment of Light
description: Deals damage to the target with the highest elemental attribute. Increases damage on hit and increases mana cost. Buffs are reset when using other skills.

name: Energy absorption
description: Consumes energy to increase elemental damage.

name: Lightning Pulse
description: Consumes all of the energy of lightning to unleash a wave of lightning in front of you, dealing lightning damage.

name: Blizzard
description: Summons a powerful Blizzard that damages enemies in front of the caster.

name: Wind totem
description: Summons a totem that increases cast and attack speed of allies.

name: Seal of Elemental Domain
description: Decreases Element DMG Taken.

name: Seal of Pain
description: Amplifies DoT.

name: Imperfect Skill Rune (Blue)
description: An imperfect Skill Rune. Unusable, but can be spend as an ingredient for synthesis.

description: Can be linked with Melee Attack Skills.
